name: Untitled 1.5, a Day in the Life of a Lowly Paid Intergalactic Phone Operator
name_original: Untitled 1.5, a Day in the Life of a Lowly Paid Intergalactic Phone Operator
description:
Untitled 1.5, a Day in the Life of a Lowly Paid Intergalactic Phone Operator

You play as a phone operator tasked with connecting phone calls between planets.  The game is designed to be accessible for players with hearing or seeing impairments.

Best experienced with a controller, but keyboard and mouse is supported.

The web browser playable version of the game does not support controller vibration.

Controls:

  • Move character - Left stick or WSAD keys
  • Triangulate wavelength of transmission - Right Trigger or Right Mouse Click
  • Select planet - A Button or Left Mouse Click

Submission for Global Game Jam 2018 based on the theme of "Transmission."

  • Programming, Art by Ben Nguyen
  • 3D Assets by ALMGP
  • Audio by sophronesinesounddesign, Backgroundloop
